detail_desc: Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short puff sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and ventilating mesh sections.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and ventilating mesh sections.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, pointelle cotton with a decorative lace trim around the neckline and armholes, and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, pointelle cotton with a decorative lace trim around the neckline and armholes, and press-studs at the crotch.

Short, V-neck dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the back and covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a zip at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Longer blouse in a woven cupro blend with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Longer blouse in a woven cupro blend with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velvet with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a visible zip at the front.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of leggings in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a skirt with straps in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a short-sleeved top in cotton jersey. Skirt with an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar, buttons down the front, a tapered waist and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
